description: Namikaze Maron comes from Saitama Prefecture and is the protagonist of the show. She is very timid and nervous, but has been gifted with immense natural strength. She takes part in the audition for Demon Seed hunters only because her mother and sister entered her for it. Once selected, she is trained to become a J-Pop idol and becomes popular enough to be entered for the Newcomer`s Award in the annual music awards.
name: Namikaze Maron
